title: A Trump Call Ignited Saudi-U.A.E. Feud
summary_full: A request made to President Trump about the war in Sudan is at the heart of a diplomatic dispute between Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.
summary_public: A request made to President Trump about the war in Sudan is at the heart of a diplomatic dispute between Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates.

SA.label: neutral
SA.evidence: dispute between Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates
